Package main.droid

Class Droid

java.lang.Object
main.droid.Droid
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleDroid, HealDroid
public class Droid extends Object
The main.droid.Droid class represents a basic unit in a game or simulation. It has attributes such as name, health, and damage, and includes methods for taking damage, checking if it is alive, and determining if it is a specialized HealDroid.
